definition: to trust/to entrust/to be entrusted with/to act as trustee
"blade of grass" component in Chinese characters
to entrust (to sb)/to place (one's hope, energy etc) in/a thing in which you invest (your hope, energy etc)
to request sb to do sth/please!
to entrust a task to sb else
full-time care (of children in a boarding nursery)
to make sth up/also written 假托[jia3 tuo1]
Leon Davidovich Trotsky (1879-1940), early Bolshevik leader, exiled by Stalin in 1929 and murdered in 1940
Torabora mountain area in east Afghanistan, famous for its caves

sentences.english: However, Toni, who knows Ribery well, believes the Bianconeri should sign him.
sentences.chinese: 然而託尼很瞭解裏貝里，並且相信尤文會簽下他。

sentences.english: It included in it thousands of brackets.
A man was sitting at a corner, with a hat in each hand, waiting for handouts.
sentences.chinese: 一個人坐在牆角處，兩手各託一頂帽子，乞求施捨。

sentences.english: I'm a stock broker, Tosha, and you.
sentences.chinese: 我是股票經紀人，託莎，你呢。

sentences.english: It was a similar story for the Toledo Museum of Art.
sentences.chinese: 對於託雷多藝術博物館來說，也是差不多的情況。

sentences.english: This part try to find the Tornatore's habits of direction and personal characteristics from the video shoot.
sentences.chinese: 從短片中找尋託納託雷的拍攝習慣和個人導演特色。

sentences.english: This part try to find the Tornatore's habits of direction and personal characteristics from the video shoot.
sentences.chinese: 從短片中找尋託納託雷的拍攝習慣和個人導演特色。

sentences.english: Tori Ritchie says it's great year-round, and for fish and veggies, too.
sentences.chinese: 託麗裏奇說，他是偉大的全年性，爲魚類和蔬菜，太。

sentences.english: Help Octo find the right answer before the missiles strike.
sentences.chinese: 幫助奧克託在導彈攻擊之前找到正確的答案。

sentences.english: We had to bring out the powerful Cheerio box to get her take the first step.
sentences.chinese: 我們就只有拿出燕麥圈，派託佳佳邁上第一步。

sentences.english: Alex and Tony were turning awkward hands to plows and hoe handles.
sentences.chinese: 亞歷克斯和託尼在犁耙等農活方面都幾乎變成新手了。

sentences.english: And the first time I saw my cousin Tony's brand new Firebird.
sentences.chinese: 是我第一次看到表哥託尼的嶄新的“火鳥”車。

sentences.english: Oh, the wind beneath my wings.
sentences.chinese: 哦，你就是那風，託舉起我的雙翼。

sentences.english: Tony smiled to himself and drummed his fingers on the edge of the table.
sentences.chinese: 託尼暗自笑了一下，然後用手指在桌子邊沿敲了起來。

sentences.english: The victor would win Toydaria's allegiance.
sentences.chinese: 勝利者將贏得託伊達里亞的忠誠。

sentences.english: You can trust your relatives here with your affairs.
sentences.chinese: 你的事可以託你這兒的親戚辦。

definition: to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
rather than.../與其|与其[yu3 qi2] A 不如[bu4 ru2] B (rather than A, better to B)
picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole
to undertake/to carry/to shoulder/to take responsibility
according to this/on the ground of the above/(formally introduces reported speech in writing)
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
